doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes material from artists, among others, Alexander Calder, Ernst Caramelle, Elizabeth Catlett, Paul Chan, Barbara Chase-Riboud, Chuang Che, Chuck Close, Elaine Lustig Cohen, James Coleman, Mary Corse, and Tony Cragg. Also includes a brochure from the Penland Gallery on an exhibition, "Parched/Inverted Landscapes" by Susan Goethel Campbell with a biography of the artist. Includes a The Met Breuer brochure on "Vija Celmins: To Fix the Image in Memory". Includes a Elaine L. Jacob Gallery catalogue on Enrique Chagoya with a paper insert that includes his biography. Also includes two brochures from the Queens Museum from the Patty Chang exhibition, "The Wandering Lake 2009-2017". Includes a brochure advertising "X" by Sue Coe, published by Raw Books & Graphics. Also includes "Poetry", a Gagosian Gallery catalogue of works by Dan Colen. Includes a Beach Museum of Art at Kansas State University brochure on the John Steuart Curry, The Way of the Modern Adventurers Exhibition.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> C (Set 2)
